```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)

MetaAnalysis_Data_New_Version_ <- read_excel("~/Dropbox_gmail/Dropbox/bat virus meta-analysis/MetaAnalysis Data New Version .xlsx")

#step one, lets only look at the serology studies 

observational_studies_henipah <- MetaAnalysis_Data_New_Version_ %>%
  filter(Study == 'Observational ') %>%
  filter(Outcome == "Seroprevalence") %>%
  filter(Virus == 'Hendra' | Virus == "Nipah" | Virus == 'Henipavirus')

observational_studies_filo <- MetaAnalysis_Data_New_Version_ %>%
  filter(Study == 'Observational ') %>%
  filter(Outcome == "Seroprevalence") %>%
  filter(Virus == 'Ebola' | Virus == "Marburg" | Virus == 'Reston Ebola' | Virus == "Sudan Virus")

```
